title: PAF releases third episode of Defence Day documentary
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 2 (APP): The Pakistan Air Force (PAF) on Thursday released the third episode of the short documentary being released in series on the occasion of Defence and Martyrsâ€™ Day.
The third episode was part of the PAF documentary comprising eight short episodes in connection with Defence Day, said a PAF news release.
The episode narrated bravery of the valiant warriors of PAF and chronicles on the day of September 02, 1965.
The documentary was a tribute to the bravery and courage of the valiant air warriors of PAF who, during the air battle of 1965, displayed unparalleled professionalism and bravery to defend the homeland.
